title: 107_s3120
content: Reclaiming Expatriated Contracts and Profits Act - Prohibits awarding Federal contracts or subcontracts to foreign incorporated entities treated as inverted domestic corporations and requires adjustments to Federal contract bids from certain previously acquired entities for a specified period following such acquisition. Authorizes: (1) a presidential waiver in the interest of national security. And (2) an exception to the application of this Act for entities that were not acquired to avoid Federal income taxation.
